channel.title: Mathematical Modeling on Chenyang‘s page
channel.description: Recent content in Mathematical Modeling on Chenyang‘s page

item.title: My paper for CUMCM2024
item.description: I participated in the 2024 China Undergraduate Mathematical Contest in Modeling(CUMCM) and won the national second prize. Our team’s winning paper is attached here for reference. You can visit the website of Haitong Lan (https://haitonglan.github.io/) (my friend and my teammate), to get more information.
